Overview:
ENJOY AN UNPRECEDENTED QUALITY OF LIFE IN THE CITY'S LARGEST EVER RESIDENTIAL TOWNSHIP

Prestige's flagship real estate concept, The Prestige City, Hyderabad is a comprehensive, self-contained, high profile residential community, comprising 119 luxury villas and 4647 high rise apartments in Rajendra Nagar. This township in Hyderabad, overlooking the sprawling Mulagund Lake and adjoining over 2000 acres of dense reserved green spaces, caters to the diverse housing needs with options like apartments and villas, all providing unparalleled, premium quality of life in the lap of nature.

The Prestige City Hyderabad, designed by renowned architect, Hafeez Contractor, is an entire world within itself, featuring leisure, recreational, and service amenities. From beautifully landscaped gardens, expansive lawns, broad and well-laid vehicle free, tree lined roads, thoughtfully designed social spaces and cultural arenas and sustainable management practices, the township project is like no other.

In short, The Prestige City offers a wholesome and holistic living experience that epitomizes the very best of community living.

Following successful launches in Bengaluru and Mumbai, Prestige extends this larger-than-life living concept to Hyderabad, offering a unique blend of apartments and villas in Rajendra Nagar, setting a new standard in residential excellence.
LocationContent: Rajendra Nagar, Hyderabad
seo_description: An ultra luxury apartment and villa community in the Prestige City Hyderabad, designed to provide its selective premium residences with an exquisite living experience. Book now
seo_title: Villa and Apartments for Sale in Hyderabad | The Prestige City

Address: 4th Cross Rd, Thimakka Layout, Coconut Garden, Cholanayakanahalli, Hebbal
Overview:
Mornings at Bangalore are about a nip in the air, a light mist swirling about you and a cool wind sending pleasurable shivers down your spine. Wake up to a home where you can get your day off to just such an invigorating start.

Prestige Misty Waters is a verdant, well laid out enclave of high rise apartments situated just off the Outer Ring Road at Hebbal. With a superb elevation, top of the line amenities, a refreshing landscape and a view to fall in love with. Every quality in fact that you have come to take for granted from Prestige. Close to all essential conveniences and yet comfortably insulated from the bustle and bother. Just the way you prefer your home to be.

Overview: Prestige Lakeside Habitat is a sprawling luxury enclave by the Prestige Group overlooking the scenic Varthur Lake. Located on Whitefield-Sarjapur Road and spread over 102 acres, it consists of 3426 luxury apartments in 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom configurations as well as 271 luxury villas set in their own private gardens. The entire township and each of the 3,697 dwellings is designed around to offer you a veritable fairyland to call home. The air and will make living here a truly enthralling experience. One captivating facet of Prestige Lakeside Habitat is the humungous 80 acres of open landscape available to you. Talk about a breath of fresh air, this is indeed more than a lungful. You’ll be hard-pressed to put your finger on another development that provides you with an open space that this expansive. Everywhere you go you will be enveloped in an ethereal, magical atmosphere that is both enthralling and reassuring.
LocationContent: Marathalli - Whitefield Road, Bengaluru

Overview: A winding road in a bustling town lined with old majestic trees, in the heart of a happening city… That’s perhaps how the description would read to your new address on Promenade Road, one of the few roads left in Bangalore that still sketches some remnants of a beautiful past. Home to Coles Park, many well-known schools and hospitals, Frazer Town has a historical past. Even as modernity is fast making its presence felt, the town still houses colonial bungalows of Gothic-styles & British Architecture. Perched in the centre of such beauty & conveniences is Prestige Deja Vu – 40 sprawling apartments spanning 21 floors, with 3 & 4 bedroom apartments. This picture of elegance rises above the ordinary, giving you an excellent view of the city. Enjoy chirpy mornings as sunbeams dance in your living rooms, with spacious balconies to welcome the sunset, in a home you will be proud to own. Explore this micro-site to uncover the colours of comfort & splendour of this new Prestige Project in Frazer Town and discover more about a home that’s been designed for you. Do make sure you submit your details in the ‘Express Interest’ section of this page, so that one of our executives could get in touch with you.
LocationContent: Saunders Rd, Pulkeshi Nagar, Bengaluru

Overview: As you drive down the Outer Ring Road in Bangalore from Marathahalli to Sarjapur Road, one of the most arresting sights on your right is the magnificent sprawling expanse of Prestige Technology Park. Ever since it came up a few years ago, it has been the definitive edifice of its class in what is today referred to as the city’s IT corridor. Prestige Tech Vista, a warm, intimate and absolutely exclusive enclave of exquisite 30 town houses, is located in the heart of Prestige Technology Park, on the Marathahalli-Sarjapur Outer Ring Road. Generously proportioned and spaciously laid to be flushed with nature’s own light and ventilation, Tech Vista offers the unbeatable combination of a prime location and a totally tranquil atmosphere. So, come discover homes that keep you a step ahead while staying in touch with your soul at Prestige Tech Vista. You will find every detail about the place that you require, within this section.

Long_description: As you drive down the Outer Ring Road in Bangalore from Marathahalli to Sarjapur Road, one of the most arresting sights on your right is the magnificent sprawling expanse of Prestige Technology Park. Ever since it came up a few years ago, it has been the definitive edifice of its class in what is today referred to as the city’s IT corridor. Prestige Tech Vista, a warm, intimate and absolutely exclusive enclave of exquisite 30 town houses, is located in the heart of Prestige Technology Park, on the Marathahalli-Sarjapur Outer Ring Road. Generously proportioned and spaciously laid to be flushed with nature’s own light and ventilation, Tech Vista offers the unbeatable combination of a prime location and a totally tranquil atmosphere. So, come discover homes that keep you a step ahead while staying in touch with your soul at Prestige Tech Vista. You will find every detail about the place that you require, within this section.

Overview: Revel in the freshness of the air, enjoy the comfort of complete privacy and immerse yourself in the lap of luxury at Prestige Glenwood. This quietly elegant, picture perfect community of twin houses and independent villas at Budigere Cross, off Old Madras Road, Bangalore is just a short drive away from the city and airport. Sprawled across 15 acres, these independent villas have their own private lawns and are surrounded by delightfully landscaped open areas, lush gardens and cobbled pathways. With world-class amenities and the best in architecture, Prestige Glenwood fulfills your picture of the perfect home! You could give our Executives a call on +91 97418 70756 for further information/to express your interest in this development.

Overview:
Welcome to a home that mirrors your penchant for style and your insistence on substance.

Prestige Park Square. On Bannerghatta Road, close to the NICE corridor, in Bengaluru.

A community of 586 high rise apartments spread over more than eight wonderfully landscaped acres.

Offering a range of sizes and bedroom configurations to suit both your needs and your budgets. Thoughtfully planned homes that blend with your lifestyle and provide for maximum natural light and ventilation.

With a clubhouse that offers ample avenues to make your leisure hours well spent, including badminton and squash courts, indoor games, table tennis, billiards and a health club.

Ideally located to be easily accessible via arterial roads and with necessary social conveniences close at hand.

Overview:
Aston Park is a community of spacious and wellplanned high-rise homes located within the upcoming ‘The Prestige City’ township, which comprises villa plots, apartments, villas and a proposed Forum retail mall.

Your home at Aston Park at The Prestige City is planned for efficient and comfortable living, with imagination and intelligence. So you get the benefit of abundant natural light and ventilation along with very pragmatic use of space. The views from every window, of course, are a treat to the senses.

Finally, you have a wide variety choice of sizes and room configurations to perfectly suit your need: two-bed, three-bed compact, three-bed premier, and three-bed duplex homes.

Long_description:
Aston Park is a community of spacious and wellplanned high-rise homes located within the upcoming ‘The Prestige City’ township, which comprises villa plots, apartments, villas and a proposed Forum retail mall.

Your home at Aston Park at The Prestige City is planned for efficient and comfortable living, with imagination and intelligence. So you get the benefit of abundant natural light and ventilation along with very pragmatic use of space. The views from every window, of course, are a treat to the senses.

Finally, you have a wide variety choice of sizes and room configurations to perfectly suit your need: two-bed, three-bed compact, three-bed premier, and three-bed duplex homes.

Overview:
The Prestige City is a picturesque township that offers a grand living experience into approx. 180Acres. It would be a family-friendly enclave where you would come across with vast open and green spaces, world-class living experience, sports facilities, shopping opportunities, cultural avenues and modern homes are no longer dreams. It offers a living experience paralleled by none other with a myriad of opportunities to live, shop, learn and play.

Strategically located on the prominent & well developed Sarjapur Main Road, it is going to be a home for more than 8000 happy families across plotted development, apartments and the villas.

Its location is surrounded by high quality office district, schools, retail and shopping, making it easier for people to go to work, learn & enjoy. The project would focus towards fulfilling every dream and aspirations of the residents.

It is planned to integrate the needs of the modern day home owner. The Prestige City is poised for growth and is getting ready to be among the most sought after, sizeable & liveable residential project in South India.
LocationContent: Yamare & Kallahalli Village, Sarjapura, Bangalore

Overview: There is a time and place for both the old and the new to meet halfway and enter into a cordial ‘gentlemen’s agreement’. Here at Prestige Silver Oak, Bangalore’s generation gap will be bridged forever! If you strike out into the hinterland off Whitefield Road, you will come upon a quiet residential enclave whose sylvan tranquility is almost magnetic. Here you will find elegantly designed independent villas ensconced in its own private gardens. Come home to the quiet life and embrace the good old days only at Prestige Silver Oak.

Overview:
This exclusive community of 117 luxe residences set in a single 20-storey tower is flanked by well-planned green spaces. The homes are oriented so that every unit has at least two sides facing the exterior to make sure that fresh air and natural light flows through. 

Prestige Camden Gardens is 10 minutes away from Manyata Tech Park, a 25 minute drive to the airport and is within easy reach of most parts of the city from Bellary Road and Outer Ring Road.

A delightful clubhouse on the ground floor provides leisure and fitness amenities making living at Prestige Camden Gardens a pleasure everyday.

Overview: Prestige White Meadows is an exclusive community that offers exclusive ultra luxury villas in Whitefield for the very upper crust. Situated on a gentle hillock in Whitefield, Bangalore’s much sought after suburb, Prestige White Meadows comprises of 288 Sky Villas in four high rise towers of up to 27 floors and 66 Independent Bungalows set in a scenic background, altogether painting a picture of a blissfully luxurious neighborhood that reposes in unquestioned majesty. The Independent Bungalows are situated on stepped terraces defining the gradual acclivity of Prestige White Meadows, while the high rise towers are located on the flatter terrain along its periphery. The Independent Bungalows with areas ranging from 5576 sq ft – 6219 sq ft are 3 storied edifices set in scenic streetscapes.
LocationContent: Sai Layout Rd, Sathya Sai Layout, Whitefield, Bengaluru

  • Counter mounted wash basins. Wall mounted EWC’s with concealed cisterns. Vanity cabinets provided below the wash basin in all toilets.

  • Shower cubicle, geysers in all toilets, with mirror & accessories.

  • Decks of the living and dining in external grade Solid Wood Flooring.
  • Engineered laminated Wooden flooring in all bedrooms.
  • Master Bedroom Balcony finished with Vitrified tiles.
  • All Toilets have Marble/Granite/Engineered Stone on the floor and walls upto the false ceiling, the gym toilet has a combination of imported marble and tiles.
  • The gym room flooring finished with laminated wood flooring and imported Marble/Granite/Engineered Stone flooring in the Steam/Sauna.
